00116 template<typename Point, typename Ptype>
00117 void sfcnn_work<Point, Ptype>::sfcnn_work_init(int num_threads)
00118 {
00119   num_threads = 1;
00120   max = (std::numeric_limits<typename Point::__NumType>::max)();
00121   min = (std::numeric_limits<typename Point::__NumType>::min)();
00122 
00123   if(points.size() == 0)
00124     {
00125       std::cerr << "Error:  Input point list has size 0" << std::endl;
00126       exit(1);
00127     }
00128   pair_iter<typename std::vector<Point>::iterator, 
00129     typename std::vector<long unsigned int>::iterator> a(points.begin(), pointers.begin()),
00130     b(points.end(), pointers.end());
00131   sort(a,b,lt);
00132 }

00135 sfcnn_work<Point, Ptype>::~sfcnn_work()
00136 {
00137 }

00139 template<typename Point, typename Ptype>
00140 void sfcnn_work<Point, Ptype>::recurse(long unsigned int s,     // Starting index
00141                                 long unsigned int n,     // Number of points
00142                                 Point q,  // Query point
00143                                 qknn &ans, // Answer que
00144                                 Point &bound_box_lower_corner,
00145                                 Point &bound_box_upper_corner,
00146                                 long unsigned int initial_scan_lower_range,
00147                                 long unsigned int initial_scan_upper_range)
00148 {
00149   if(n < 4)
00150     {
00151       if(n == 0) return;
00152                 
00153       bool update=false;
00154       for(long unsigned int i=0;i < n;++i)
00155         {
00156           if((s+i >= initial_scan_lower_range) 
00157              && (s+i < initial_scan_upper_range))
00158             continue;
00159           update = ans.update(points[s+i].sqr_dist(q), pointers[s+i]) || update;
00160         }
00161       if(update)
00162         compute_bounding_box(q, bound_box_lower_corner, bound_box_upper_corner, sqrt(ans.topdist()));
00163       return;
00164     }
00165   
00166   if((s+n/2 >= initial_scan_lower_range) && (s+n/2 < initial_scan_upper_range))
00167     {
00168     }
00169   else if(ans.update(points[s+n/2].sqr_dist(q), pointers[s+n/2]))
00170     compute_bounding_box(q, bound_box_lower_corner, bound_box_upper_corner, sqrt(ans.topdist()));
00171   
00172   double dsqb = lt.dist_sq_to_quad_box(q,points[s], points[s+n-1]);
00173   
00174   //cout << "dsqb: " << dsqb << endl;
00175   //cout << "dist: " << ans.topdist() << endl;
00176   //cout << "p1  : " << points[s] << endl;
00177   //cout << "p2  : " << points[s+n-1] << endl;
00178   if(dsqb > ans.topdist())
00179     return;
00180   
00181         
00182   if(lt(q,points[s+n/2]))
00183     {
00184       //search_queue.push(pair<int, int>(s, n/2));
00185       recurse(s, n/2, q, ans, 
00186               bound_box_lower_corner, 
00187               bound_box_upper_corner, 
00188               initial_scan_lower_range, 
00189               initial_scan_upper_range);
00190       if(lt(points[s+n/2],bound_box_upper_corner))
00191         //search_queue.push(pair<int, int>(s+n/2+1, n-n/2-1));
00192         recurse(s+n/2+1,n-n/2-1, q, ans, 
00193                 bound_box_lower_corner, 
00194                 bound_box_upper_corner, 
00195                 initial_scan_lower_range, 
00196                 initial_scan_upper_range);
00197     }
00198   else
00199     {
00200       recurse(s+n/2+1, n-n/2-1, q, ans, 
00201               bound_box_lower_corner, 
00202               bound_box_upper_corner, 
00203               initial_scan_lower_range, 
00204               initial_scan_upper_range);
00205       //search_queue.push(pair<int, int>(s+n/2+1, n-n/2-1));
00206       if(lt(bound_box_lower_corner,points[s+n/2]))
00207         //search_queue.push(pair<int, int>(s, n/2));
00208         recurse(s, n/2, q, ans, 
00209                 bound_box_lower_corner, 
00210                 bound_box_upper_corner, 
00211                 initial_scan_lower_range, 
00212                 initial_scan_upper_range);
00213     }
00214 }
00215 
00216 template<typename Point, typename Ptype>
00217 void sfcnn_work<Point, Ptype>::compute_bounding_box(Point q, Point &q1, Point &q2, double R)
00218 {
00219   cbb_work<Point, Ptype>::eval(q, q1, q2, R, max, min);
00220 }
00221 
00222 template<typename Point, typename Ptype>
00223 void sfcnn_work<Point, Ptype>::ksearch_common(Point q, unsigned int k, long unsigned int query_point_index, qknn &que, float Eps)
00224 {
00225   Point bound_box_lower_corner, bound_box_upper_corner;
00226   Point low, high;
00227   
00228   que.set_size(k);
00229   eps=(float) 1.0+Eps;
00230   if(query_point_index >= (k)) query_point_index -= (k);
00231   else query_point_index=0;
00232   
00233   long unsigned int initial_scan_upper_range=query_point_index+2*k+1;
00234   if(initial_scan_upper_range > (long unsigned int)points.size())
00235     initial_scan_upper_range = (long unsigned int)points.size();
00236   
00237   low = points[query_point_index];
00238   high = points[initial_scan_upper_range-1];
00239   for(long unsigned int i=query_point_index;i<initial_scan_upper_range;++i)
00240     {
00241       que.update(points[i].sqr_dist(q), pointers[i]);
00242     }
00243   compute_bounding_box(q, bound_box_lower_corner, bound_box_upper_corner, sqrt(que.topdist()));
00244   
00245   if(lt(bound_box_upper_corner, high) && lt(low,bound_box_lower_corner))
00246     {
00247       //cout << "Inital search break!" << endl;
00248       //cout << "Bb1: " << bound_box_lower_corner << endl;
00249       //cout << "Bb2: " << bound_box_upper_corner << endl;
00250       return;
00251     }
00252   
00253   //Recurse through the entire set
00254   recurse(0, points.size(), q, que, 
00255           bound_box_lower_corner, 
00256           bound_box_upper_corner,
00257           query_point_index,
00258           initial_scan_upper_range);
00259   //cout << "Bb1: " << bound_box_lower_corner << endl;
00260   //cout << "Bb2: " << bound_box_upper_corner << endl;
00261 }
00262 
00263 template<typename Point, typename Ptype>
00264 void sfcnn_work<Point, Ptype>::ksearch(Point q, unsigned int k, 
00265                               std::vector<long unsigned int> &nn_idx, float Eps)
00266 {
00267   long unsigned int query_point_index;  
00268   qknn que;
00269   query_point_index = BinarySearch(points, q, lt);
00270   ksearch_common(q, k, query_point_index, que, Eps);
00271   que.answer(nn_idx);
00272 }
00273 
00274 template<typename Point, typename Ptype>
00275 void sfcnn_work<Point, Ptype>::ksearch(Point q, unsigned int k, 
00276                                 std::vector<long unsigned int> &nn_idx, std::vector<double> &dist, float Eps)
00277 {
00278   long unsigned int query_point_index;  
00279   qknn que;
00280   query_point_index = BinarySearch(points, q, lt);
00281   ksearch_common(q, k, query_point_index, que, Eps);
00282   que.answer(nn_idx, dist);
00283 }

00296 template <typename Point, unsigned int Dim, typename NumType>
00297 class sfcnn : public nnBase<Point, Dim, NumType>
00298 {
00299 public:
00303   sfcnn(){};
00313   sfcnn(Point *points, long int N, int num_threads=1)
00314   {
00315     sfcnn_init(points,N,num_threads);
00316   };
00317   ~sfcnn(){};
00318 
00330   void ksearch(Point q, unsigned int k, std::vector<long unsigned int> &nn_idx, float eps = 0)
00331   {
00332     NN.ksearch(q,k,nn_idx,eps);
00333   };
00347   void ksearch(Point q, unsigned int k, std::vector<long unsigned int> &nn_idx, std::vector<double> &dist, float eps=0)
00348   {
00349     NN.ksearch(q,k,nn_idx,dist,eps);
00350   };
00351 private:
00352   sfcnn_work<reviver::dpoint<NumType, Dim> > NN;
00353   void sfcnn_init(Point *points, long int N, int num_threads=1)
00354   {
00355     NN.points.resize(N);
00356     NN.pointers.resize(N);
00357     
00358     for(long int i=0;i < N;++i)
00359       {
00360         NN.pointers[i] = (i);
00361         for(unsigned int j=0;j < Dim;++j)
00362           NN.points[i][j] = points[i][j];
00363       }
00364     NN.sfcnn_work_init(num_threads);
00365   };
00366 
00367 };
